name: KT-Browser
description: An open-source web browser of KTTECH Team.

scripts.buildwin: electron-packager . --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --asar --overwrite --icon=icon.ico --prune=true --out=release-builds --version-string.CompanyName="KTTECH Team" --version-string.ProductName="KT Browser" --version-string.FileDescription="KT Browser Alpha" --version-string.InternalName="KT Browser.exe" --version-string.OriginalFilename="KT Browser.exe" --version-string.LegalCopyright="Copyright (C) 2017 KTTECH Team., Inc. All rights reserved."  --version-string.ProductVersion=7.0
scripts.buildwin64: electron-packager . --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --asar --overwrite --icon=icon.ico --prune=true --out=release-builds --version-string.CompanyName="KTTECH Team" --version-string.ProductName="KT Browser" --version-string.FileDescription="KT Browser Alpha" --version-string.InternalName="KT Browser.exe" --version-string.OriginalFilename="KT Browser.exe" --version-string.LegalCopyright="Copyright (C) 2017 KTTECH Team., Inc. All rights reserved."  --version-string.ProductVersion=7.0
